title: Remove IMC Objectives and IMC Plan sections from the website

requirements.text: Remove the “IMC Objectives” and “IMC Plan” sections from the rendered website so they no longer appear on the page.

quotes: remove the IMC objectives and IMC plan from the website.

acceptanceCriteria: The home page no longer renders the IMC Objectives section (no section with id="imc-objectives" in the DOM).
The home page no longer renders the IMC Plan section (no section with id="imc-plan" in the DOM).
No user-facing copy referencing “Integrated Marketing Communication Objectives” or “Integrated Marketing Communication Plan” is visible anywhere on the site.

requirements.text: Update the site navigation to remove any links/buttons that point to the removed IMC sections.

quotes: remove the IMC objectives and IMC plan from the website.

acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation no longer includes “IMC Objectives” or “IMC Plan” items in desktop or mobile menus.
Clicking any remaining navigation items does not attempt to scroll to non-existent IMC section anchors (no console errors/warnings caused by missing IMC sections).

requirements.text: Clean up unused frontend code related to the removed IMC sections to avoid dead imports and build/lint warnings.

quotes: remove the IMC objectives and IMC plan from the website.

acceptanceCriteria: There are no unused imports of IMC sections in frontend/src/App.tsx or other updated files.
The frontend builds successfully after removal without TypeScript errors related to the IMC sections.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the content or layout of remaining sections (Hero, Brand Story, Products, Sustainability, For Distributors, Contact) except as necessary to remove the IMC sections and related navigation.
Do not change backend functionality (inquiry storage/retrieval) since IMC sections are frontend-only.
